environment_variables.JOB_TAG: A user-defined tag that identifies the job
environment_variables.JOB_DIR: The directory where the job scripts are located
environment_variables.JOB_RESULTS_DIR: The directory where job results are saved
environment_variables.CHUNK_SIZE: The size of the reads file to be split into chunks for parallel processing
environment_variables.PBS_QUEUE: The PBS queue to submit the job to
environment_variables.PBS_MEMORY: The amount of memory to allocate to each job
environment_variables.PBS_JVM_FLAGS: Java Virtual Machine flags for the goby application
environment_variables.PBS_STATUS_MAILTO: The email address to send status notifications to
environment_variables.REFERENCE_INDEX_NAME: The name of the reference genome index
environment_variables.REFERENCE_INDEX_DIRECTORY: The directory where the reference genome index is located
environment_variables.ALIGNER: The aligner to use for the job
environment_variables.COLORSPACE: Whether or not to use color space for the alignment
environment_variables.BASENAME: The base name of the reads file
environment_variables.PBS_JOB_NAME: The name of the PBS job
